comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content:
Matthew Bacon Sellers, Jr. (1869-1932) was the assistant to the Secretary of the Navy.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/richard_arthur_norton/8252408205/in/photostream]

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: A biography, written by his granddaughter: books.google.com/books?id=igvB-kdZmaYC&dq=matthew+b.+... ...who has also set up this web site with a page devoted to a biographical sketch: www.matthewbsellers.com/page7 A group photo, including Sellers, of the new Naval Advisory Board ska Naval Consulting Board, chaired by Thomas Edison and made up of nominees from all the major scientific institutes and associations (October, 1915). select.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=FB0E12F93C5D1773... en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Naval_Consulting_Board

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks Richard Arthur Norton for his full name and his obituary. We'll included in our record.
